post.body: get away from them for domains. you only took their domainz cuz they were free! GODADDY 4 LYFE!
oh yeah, if you arent getting a bunch of hits, just need to host some low traffic blogs, etc, go for it!
1&1 is a disaster and a trainwreck all rolled into one. Ive had sites get "too popular" and moved without notice. Screw them!
dreamhost is sometimes ok, they do shared hosting, you are on a server with a bunch of other peeps.
shared or dedicated box? singlehop.com is good for dedicated servers. shared, try midphase.com
indeed, its going to be an adventure!
what size instances are you using? is this for sweat365?
nope, havent had the opportunity. sure does get a bad rap tho. @spooons running around plastering Fails stickers everywhere!

have defined start+end times. dont waste my time, i wont waste yerz mentality. and whoever leads mtg needs to LEAD the mtg.

no, state by state. national license.... hahaha HURF NURF!
no reciprocity means i would have to sit classes, just like you or any other schmoe. id rather stab myself in the thigh.

memcache + xcache + tuned apache + php5 makes me very happy. im amazed with the performance of this box!
i have completely disassembled the wifes laptop, just to replace a tiny power cable. one pile of parts, one pile of screws. why me!
